details: [ u'GARNIER', u' COLOR NATURALS HAIR COLOR SHADE NO 1 ',  u'Garnier', u' Color Naturals is a permanent ', u'colour', u' cream enriched with Olive oil, that nourishes the hair as it ', u'colours.Your', u' hair is deeply nourished, your ', u'colour', u' is richer, more uniform and shinier. The second ratio of olive oil in the conditioner is a real treatment for your hair. Your hair is soft and your ', u'colour', u' radiant and there is no grey hair.',  u'Directions for Use',  u'1. PREPARATION',  u'Read carefully the instructions leaflet before application. One must always do a skin allergy test without fail 48 hours before each use of this product. Put gloves on. Open cap of the Developer bottle. Pour the entire contents into a non-metallic bowl. Open the cap of the Cream Hair ', u'Colourant', u' (seal to be pierced with the point in the cap) Squeeze the entire contents of the Cream Hair ', u'Colourant', u' downwards into the plastic bowl. Mix the ', u'colourant', u' and the developer with a hair ', u'colouring', u' brush and stir well till the mixture is smooth in texture. Apply immediately.',  u'2. APPLICATION TO FULL HEAD',  u'EASY METHOD FOR APPLICATION:',  u'1. With a hair ', u'colouring', u' brush, apply the mixture on dry, unwashed hair. Start by applying the mixture to the roots, separating the hair strand by strand.', u'2. Spread the remaining mixture through the rest of the hair.', u'3. For full head application, cover the entire hair well with the mixture. For touch up application, concentrate solely on the grey or on the root areas.', u'4. Leave to develop for 30 minutes.', u'5. Throw away any unused mixture. Tip : Overtime, the cream may turn dark, due to exposure to air. Ignore, as this has no bearing on product performance and final ', u'colour', u' result.',  u'RINSE',  u'1. After 30 minutes of the development time, wet hair a little and gently lather for 1 minute.', u'2. Rinse well with water until the water runs clear.',  u'3. TOUCH-UP APPLICATION',  u"TOUCH-UP' is when you concentrate on applying ", u'colour', u' on the roots of previously ', u'coloured', u' hair, close to the scalp (grey or new natural hair growth).\ufeff']
name: GARNIER COLOR NATURALS HAIR COLOR SHADE NO 1

details: [ u'Face oasis ultra hydrator',  u'Enriched', u' with ', u'nutri-sphere', u' technology, Atlantic brown algae and antioxidant multivitamins, this oil-free formula supplies a deep surge of moisture to instantly replenish and illuminate your skin.',         u'']
name: Face oasis ultra hydrator

details: [ u'Oasis Men Oil- Free Post Shave Balm', u'Rapidly cool, calm and comfort freshly shaved skin with a soothing, oil-free balm ', u'with Sea kelp, Iceland moss, ', u'menthyl', u' and multi-mineral complex.',  u'product details: ', u'A quality Product From ', u'H2O']
